rukus.text: khushki aur tari mein logo ki badh amaaliyo ke baayes, fasaad pehel gaya, is liye ke inhe baaz kartuto ka phal Allah ta’ala chaka de(bahuth) mumkin hai ke wo baaz aa jaaye
zameen mein chal phir kar dekho to sahih ke aglo ka anjaam kya hoa, jin mein aksar log mushrik thein
pas aap apna rukh us sacche aur sidhe deen ki taraf hee rakhe, qabl us ke, ke wo din aa jaaye jis ka tal jaana Allah ta’ala ki taraf se hai hee nahi, us din sab mutafarriq ho jayenge
kufr karne waalo par un ke kufr ka wabaal hoga aur nek kaam karne waale apni hee araam gaah sawaar rahe hai
ta ke Allah ta’ala unhe apne fazl se jaza de, jo imaan laaye aur nek amaal kiye, wo kaafiro ko dosth nahi rakhta hai

us ki nishaaniyo mein se khush qabriya dene waali hawaao ko chalaana bhi hai, is liye ke tumhe api rahmath se lutf andooz kare aur is liye ke us ke hukm se kashtiyaa chale aur is liye ke us ke fazl ko tum dhundo aur is liye ke tum shukr guzaari karo
aur hum ne aap se pehle bhi apne rasulo ko un ki khaum ki taraf bheja, wo un ke paas dalile laaye, phir hum ne gunehgaaro se inteqaam liya, hum par momino ki madad karna laazim hai

Allah ta’ala hawaaye chalaata hai, wo abr ko uthaati hai, phir Allah ta’ala apni mansha ke mutaabiq ose asmaan mein phaila deta hai aur us ke tukde tukde gira deta hai, phir aap dekhte hai ke us ke andar se qatre nikalte hai aur jinhe Allah chaahta hai, un bandho par wo paani barsaata hai, to wo khush khush ho jaate hai
yaqinan wo un par baarish barasne se pehle mayoos ho rahe thein

pas aap rahmate ilaahi ke asaar dekhe ke zameen ki mauth ke baadh kis tarah Allah ta’ala ose zinda kar deta hai? kuch shak nahi ke wahi murdo ko zinda karne waala hai aur wo har har cheez par qaadir hai
aur agar hum baadhe-tundh1 hawa chala de, aur ye log unhee kheto ko (murjhaayi hoyi) zardh padi hoyi dekh le to, phir us ke baadh na shukri karne lage
beshak aap murdo ko nahi suna sakte aur na behro ko (apni) awaaz suna sakte hai, jab ke wo peet pher kar mud gaye ho
aur na aap andho ko un ki gumraahi se hidaayath karne waale hai, aap to sirf unhee logo ko sunaate hai jo hamaari aayato par imaan rakhte hai, pas wahi ita’ath karne waale hai
